system.requirement: When you sing an ancient hymn to a god below, roll +wits

abilities.description: Star (Chandra): Ask a single question. On a strong hit, you read a helpful omen in the stars. Envision what you learn (ask the Oracle if unsure) and take +2 momentum. On a weak hit, the omen contains a warning. Envision this warning and take only +1 momentum.
Fire (Agni): On a strong hit, an object you hold alights with ghostly flame dispeling the darkness in a large area. On a weak hit, the flame dispels the darkness in your immediate area.

Storm (Indra): On a hit, dark clouds gather and gentle rain begins to fall that lasts up to an hour. On a strong hit, you may direct the clouds to become a thunderstorm or flood-inducing torrential rain instead.
